review: Yes! No buffering.  Had probs. with Apple tv buffering, fire stick fixed that.  Btw it's not just a stick, for peak performance, you need to plug it in with the wire that is included.
author: tigress

review: Super easy setup. With Amazon prime every thing is so easy to order an amazing variet of movies and TV programs. Would recommend this to anyone
author: kdhuff

review: LOVE IT!!!!! Super easy to get started and going in no time!
author: Meghan Detty

review: great - just as expected - thank you!
author: Joseph

review: I have the fire stick and chromecast. Both are good quality for stuff like YouTube, Hulu, etc., but I love the fire stick for the amazon prime usage. The remote is nice as well. Play, pause, power on TV for the remote is great. Overall great product for prime and good for the other apps that it supports. Bias note, prime is the only subscription service that I have.
author: Thomas J. Robideau

review: Decent little stick that provides basic content. I use it mostly for the netflix and plex aspect of it not being an Amazon prime member. The only thing that would be better is if you could mirror a phone that's not a fire phone cause honestly how many people own those.
author: Koop

review: came in the mail earlier than expected.works great very easy to set uphighly reccome
author: William R McNew

review: Works great, better than I expected.
author: TERESA T. BUCK

review: Excellent product that works exactly as advertised.  Just wish there was more free movies and unless you are an Amazon Prime Member, the cost of the films is even higher.  Still very much worth the cost for what it does.  I would recommend this and have to several of my friends
author: Larry C. Bowles "fersken"
